00036 #ifndef _XED_COMMON_HDRS_H_

00040 #if !defined(XED_MESSAGES)
00041 # define XED_MESSAGES 0
00042 #endif
00043 
00044 #if defined(XED_DLL)
00045 //  __declspec(dllexport) works with GNU GCC or MS compilers, but not ICC
00046 //  on linux
00047 # define XED_DLL_EXPORT __declspec(dllexport)
00048 # define XED_DLL_IMPORT __declspec(dllimport)
00049 #  if defined(XED_BUILD)
00050 #    define XED_DLL_GLOBAL XED_DLL_EXPORT
00051 #  else
00052 #    define XED_DLL_GLOBAL XED_DLL_IMPORT
00053 #  endif
00054 #else
00055 # define XED_DLL_EXPORT 
00056 # define XED_DLL_IMPORT
00057 # define XED_DLL_GLOBAL
00058 #endif

00061 #if defined(XED_OMIT_ENCODER)
00062      /* do not emit an encoder */
00063 #else
00064 # define XED_ENCODER
00065 #endif
00066

00070 # define XED_DECODER
